attributes.action: save our local Fire Station at Copnor in Portsmouth from closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Hampshire Fire Authority has recently voted to close Copnor Fire Station in Portsmouth. This is against the united position of all parties in Portsmouth and the united will of Portsmouth residents. Only last month a blaze, which killed one person, was attended to first by an engine from Copnor station. This is reason enough to know that we need this vital LOCAL service.
